main event: Mrs. W. F. Tompkins reported seeing a flying saucer near San Angelo at 4:45 p.m., which appeared to be stationary for about two minutes before zooming upward and disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object appeared to be shaped like a saucer, resembling the classic 'flying saucer' image associated with UFOs.
The report was turned over to the Air Force by the San Angelo Standard-Times, indicating official interest in the sighting.
The object was observed at 10 miles north of San Angelo, providing a specific location for the sighting.
The object's behavior of being stationary before zooming upward aligns with classic UFO sighting descriptions.
The sighting was made in broad daylight, at 4:45 p.m., adding credibility to the observation.
